Kenya Visa Requirements

Single Entry Visa Requirements

Issued for single entry to persons whose nationalities require a visa to enter Kenya either for business, tourism, medical or other reasons.

Basic Requirements

  1. Valid travel document not less than six months.
  2. A Return ticket

Validity

Category 2 Single Entry Visa is valid for travel with 3 months from the date of issue

Attachments

During the application process, you will be required to attach the following documents. The file formats that may be attached are PDF, JPG, or Microsoft word.

For Business Visits

  1. Invitation Letters from company / Invitation letter for business visits
  2. Copies of registration of the company
  3. Return air ticket

For Family visits

  1. Invitation Letters from family.
  2. Identity card / Passport / Alien card / Entry permit of the host.
  3. Return air ticket

For Tourists

  1. Travel itinerary (Details about places to visit if going as a tourist).
  2. Hotel bookings.
  3. Return air ticket

Contact Us

For any support above requirements please contact us :


E-mail: info@applykenyaevisa.com

Transit Visa

Issued to persons connecting through Kenya to other destinations for a period not exceeding 72 hours. Those connecting flights directly without leaving the airport don't need to apply for Transit visas.

Basic Requirements

  1. Valid travel document not less than six months.
  2. A round trip ticket.

 

Contact Us

For any support above requirements please contact us :


E-mail: info@applykenyaevisa.com

East African Tourist Visa

This is a Joint Tourist Visa issued to persons traveling to and within Kenya, Rwanda and Uganda for tourism.

Present EVisa Printout to immigration control at the point of entry. East Africa Visa Sticker will be issues at the point of Entry in Kenya.

Basic Requirements

  1. Valid travel document not less than six months.
  2. A Return ticket

Validity

An East Africa Visa is valid for 3 months from the date of issue.

 

Contact Us

For any support above requirements please contact us :


E-mail: info@applykenyaevisa.com

Multiple Entry Visa

Issued to Persons who frequent Kenya and their nationalities require a visa to enter Kenya either for business, tourism, medical or other reasons

Present EVisa Printout to immigration control at the point of entry.

 

Basic Requirements

  1. Valid travel document not less than six months.
  2. A Return ticket

Validity

A Multiple entry visa is valid for 3 to 12 months from the date of issue.

 

Contact Us

For any support above requirements please contact us :


E-mail: info@applykenyaevisa.com

Photo requirements

Attachments

During the application process, you will be required to attach the following documents. The file formats that may be attached are PDF, JPG, or Microsoft word.

Identity Documents

  1. Clear Passport biodata page.
  2. A clear photograph.

Photo requirements

  1. DO NOT take a photograph of or scan the photo in your passport.
  2. Must be taken within the past 6 months, showing your current appearance.
  3. Must be in color.
  4. Must show your full face, front view with a plain white or off-white background.
  5. Must show a full face, front view with a plain white or off-white background.
  6. Must be taken in normal street attire. Uniforms should NOT BE worn in photographs except religious attire that is worn daily.
  7. Do not wear a hat or headgear that obscures the hair or hairline.
  8. If you normally wear prescription glasses, a hearing device, wig, or similar articles, they should be worn for your picture.
  9. Dark glasses or nonprescription glasses with tinted lenses are not acceptable unless you need them for medical reasons. A medical certificate may be required.

Countries Eligible for Kenya

Citizens from the countries listed below are eligible to apply online to enter Kenya
